item.title: New year resolution + 1st post
item.description:
One thing that I greatly admire my advisor, Prof. D. Wittman, is that he explains things very clearly.
Now as a science student I think this is a very important ability that I still need to improve on. By setting up this blog I hope to force myself to explain and share with others the mini-projects / ideas that I am working / have worked on.
item.dc:creator: K. Y. Ng
